Documentation for the mouse¶

This is for testing the sphinx.

class mouse.Micromouse(mazeMap)¶
The Micromouse represents an agent to perfrom tasks. It maintains:
  • a map
  • a task loader
  • a command translator
  • a wall detector
  • the direction it faces
setInitPoint(x, y)¶

InitPoint
